SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID , A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CHANGE_RCEPT_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CHANGE_RCEPT_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PLAN_BEGIN_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PLAN_BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PLAN_END_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PLAN_END_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REAL_OPERT_BEGIN_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REAL_OPERT_BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REAL_OPERT_END_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REAL_OPERT_END_DE , B.CHANGE_REQUST_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CHANGE_REQUST_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CHANGE_REQUST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.COMPT_REQUST_DE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS COMPT_REQUST_DE , B.CHANGE_REQUST_ID , T1.CODE_NM AS CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM , T2.CODE_NM AS EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT , T3.CODE_NM AS CHANGE_SE_CODE , NVL(U1.MBER_NM,'') AS CHANGE_OPERTOR_NM FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO B ON A.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = B.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD T1 on T1.CODE_ID = 'OE1003' AND A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = T1.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD T2 on T2.CODE_ID = 'OE1005' AND A.EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT = T2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD T3 on T3.CODE_ID = 'OE1016' AND A.CHANGE_SE_CODE = T3.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNUSERINFO U1 on U1.MBER_ID = A.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID WHERE A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE NOT IN ('01','02')
A.EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT = #emrgncyProcessAt#
A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #changeProcessSttusCode#
A.CHANGE_SE_CODE = #changeSeCode#
B.COMPT_REQUST_DE BETWEEN REPLACE(#fromDate#,'-','') AND REPLACE(#toDate#,'-','')
ORDER BY B.COMPT_REQUST_DE ASC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO B ON A.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = B.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID WHERE A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE NOT IN ('01','02')
A.EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT = #emrgncyProcessAt#
A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #changeProcessSttusCode#
A.CHANGE_SE_CODE = #changeSeCode#
B.COMPT_REQUST_DE BETWEEN REPLACE(#fromDate#,'-','') AND REPLACE(#toDate#,'-','')

SELECT COUNT(CHANGE_REQUST_ID) totalRequstCount , COUNT(CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID) totalRegistCount FROM OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO WHERE 1=1
CHANGE_REQUST_DE BETWEEN REPLACE(#fromDate#,'-','') AND REPLACE(#toDate#,'-','')
